name: Adaptive Defense
text: While this card is the top card of your discard pile, it counts as a Defense Card in your sequence for the attrition check.

name: Adrenaline Rush
text: Draw X.

name: Bludgeon
text: Assist. Confuse the monster.

name: Call of the Dragon
text: Draw 1. If your health is critical, draw cards until you have 5 instead.

name: Charge
text: Choose a player to draw 1.

name: Chase
text: When you discard this card from your hand to generate stamina, your weapon gets +2 damage until the end of the turn.

name: Concussion
text: Stun the monster.

name: Confrontation
text: Remove 1 struggle. If you are the aggro player, remove 2 struggle instead.

name: Dashing Blow
text: Increase the damage this attack deals by 5. Reduce the stamina cost of this card by 1 for each card with impetus in your discard pile.

name: Decisive Effort
text: Black Diamond + Red Diamond: Increase the damage the attack deals by 3.

name: Deep Breath
text: Draw 2.

name: Disruption
text: When another player plays Red Diamond Red Diamond in their sequence, you may discard this card from your hand to stun the monster.

name: Dragon Bane
text: Taunt. The monster immediately turns to your sector and your weapon gets +2 damage until the end of this turn.

name: Endeavour
text: Assist. Recycle 2.

name: Enrage
text: Search your deck for a Red Diamond and add it to your hand. Then reshuffle your deck.

name: Evasive Action
text: Take a strain token unless your mastery is focused.

name: Exhausting Strike
text: Assist. Increase the struggle this maneuver removes by 1.

name: For Alborea!
text: Assist. Draw 1 for each card with impetus in your discard pile.

name: Frontal Assault
text: Choose a player to draw 1. If you are in the front sector, they draw 2 instead.

name: Grace
text: Reduce the stamina cost of each Defense Card you play this turn by 1.

name: Heavy Smash
text: Remove 1 struggle. Scissors: Remove 3 struggle instead.

name: Impulse
text: Search your deck for a card with impetus and add it to your hand. Then reshuffle your deck.

name: Impressive Strike
text: If you have any strain tokens, stun or confuse the monster.

name: Iron Will
text: Draw 1. If you paid with a Blue Diamond, draw 2 instead.

name: Ironblast
text: Increase the damage this attack deals by 2. Opening: This attack inflicts vulnerable.

name: Judgement
text: When a player would suffer attrition damage and you are in the front sector, you may discard this card from your hand to prevent that damage and remove struggle equal to the current attrition level.

name: Knockout
text: Red Diamond + Black Diamond: Stun the monster.

name: Leverage
text: Draw cards equal to the current amount of struggle tokens on the monster (max: 5 cards).

name: Limitless Stamina
text: When you discard this card to generate stamina for a Red Diamond, it generates 4 stamina.

name: Mighty Strain
text: When you discard this card from your hand, take a strain token.

name: Perseverance
text: Draw 1.

name: Rapid Blow
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard this card from your hand to cancel the effects of that card.

name: Rumbling Impact
text: Confuse the monster. Scissors: Increase the damage this attack deals by 1 for each exposed monster side.

name: Sharp Reflexes
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard this card from your hand to immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Skull Crusher
text: Black Diamond + Red Diamond: If you are in the front sector, stun the monster and increase the damage the attack deals by 2.

name: Sledgehammer
text: You can only play this card after a Blue Diamond. Increase the damage this attack deals by X (max increase: 7).

name: Stamina Boost
text: Reduce the stamina cost of the next Defense Card you play in your sequence by 1. When you discard this card to generate stamina for a Red Diamond and your mastery is focused, it generates 4 stamina.

name: Step Back
text: Finisher. Discard a strain token.

name: Stormstrike
text: Finisher. Increase the damage this attack deals by X (max increase: 7). If you pay 6 or more for this card, confuse the monster.

name: Tackle
text: When another player pays the stamina cost of a card, you may discard this card from your hand. If you do, reduce that stamina cost by 1 and that player's card gains stealth.

name: Tear Down
text: If the monster has 0 struggle, increase the damage this attack deals by 5. Otherwise, remove 2 struggle.

name: Tenacity
text: This card does not count towards your hand size limit.

name: Thunderous Voice
text: Taunt. Remove 1 struggle. If you are the aggro player, remove 2 struggle instead.

name: Whirlwind
text: Assist. Black Diamond + Blue Diamond + Red Diamond: Increase the damage the attack deals by 3.
